name: linear-tracker
description: Manage Linear issues, projects, and cycles via the Linear GraphQL API. Create/update/list/get issues, create/list projects, add comments, search issues, and manage cycles. Uses injected provider client for API access (BYOK).
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: linear_tracker
toolDefinition.description: Manage Linear issues, projects, and cycles: create/update/list/get issues, create/list projects, add comments, search issues, and manage cycles. Layer 1 skill using injected provider client for Linear GraphQL API access.

action.description: create_issue (new issue), update_issue (modify issue), list_issues (filter issues), get_issue (issue details), create_project (new project), list_projects (all projects), add_comment (comment on issue), search_issues (text search), manage_cycle (create/list/get/add_issue to cycles)

issueId.description: Linear issue ID. Required for get_issue, update_issue, add_comment, manage_cycle (subAction: add_issue).

description.description: Issue or project description. Used by create_issue, update_issue, create_project.

teamId.description: Linear team ID. Required for create_issue, manage_cycle (subAction: create). Used by list_issues.

priority.description: Issue priority (0=none, 1=urgent, 2=high, 3=medium, 4=low). Used by create_issue, update_issue.

assigneeId.description: User ID for assignment. Used by create_issue, update_issue, list_issues.

labelIds.description: Label IDs to apply. Used by create_issue.

stateId.description: Workflow state ID. Used by create_issue, update_issue, list_issues.

name.description: Project or cycle name. Required for create_project, manage_cycle (subAction: create).

teamIds.description: Team IDs for project. Required for create_project.

body.description: Comment body text. Required for add_comment.

query.description: Search query string. Required for search_issues.

limit.description: Maximum results to return (default: 25, max: 100). Used by list_issues, list_projects, search_issues.

cycleId.description: Cycle ID. Required for manage_cycle (subAction: get, add_issue).

startsAt.description: Cycle start date (ISO 8601). Required for manage_cycle (subAction: create).

endsAt.description: Cycle end date (ISO 8601). Required for manage_cycle (subAction: create).
